feed.title: WeKan Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for WeKan: v7.77
entry.content:
This release adds the following new features:

  • Allow vertical scrollbars to be disabled (new preference). Thanks to NadavTasher.

and fixes the following bugs:

  • Enable keyboard shortcuts by default. Thanks to NadavTasher.
  • Fix comment backgrounds in cleandark theme. Thanks to NadavTasher.
  • Fix weird add checklist buttons in card details. Thanks to NadavTasher.
  • Fix "SPACE" shortcut not working after recent fixes. Thanks to NadavTasher.

Thanks to above GitHub users for their contributions and translators for their translations.

entry.title: New release for WeKan: v7.78
entry.content:
This release fixes the following bugs:

  • Disable scrollbars on older versions of Chrome and Safari in "no vertical scrollbars" mode. Thanks to NadavTasher.
  • Fix styling for vertical scrollbars toggle. Thanks to NadavTasher.
  • Add additional archiving keyboard shortcut (added -). Thanks to NadavTasher.
  • Fix assign-self shortcut in shortcut help popup (different from actual shortcut). Thanks to NadavTasher.
  • Fix upper-case keyboard shortcuts & different language shortcuts getting triggered when shortcuts are disabled. Thanks to NadavTasher.
  • Fix list header too wide in cleanlight and cleandark themes. Thanks to NadavTasher.

Thanks to above GitHub users for their contributions and translators for their translations.

entry.title: New release for WeKan: v7.79
entry.content:
This release adds the following new features:

  • Add toggle for week-of-year in date displays (ISO 8601). Thanks to NadavTasher.
  • Assign members using keyboard shortcut Ctrl+Alt+(1-9). Thanks to NadavTasher.

Thanks to above GitHub users for their contributions and translators for their translations.

entry.title: New release for WeKan: v7.80
entry.content:
This release fixes the following bugs:

  • Fix card updating issues with ReactiveCache when using keyboard shortcuts. Thanks to NadavTasher.
  • Fix assignee toggling keyboard shortcut to only toggle current board members. Thanks to NadavTasher.

Thanks to above GitHub users for their contributions and translators for their translations.

entry.title: New release for WeKan: v7.81
entry.content:
This release adds the following new features:

  • Helm Chart: Added secretManaged value for enabling or disabling the creation of secret by Helm. Thanks to salleman33.

and adds the following updates:

  • Updated Docker Actions. Thanks to dependabot.
  • Added Meteor 3.1 learning course to docs. Thanks to producer of learning course.
  • Upgraded to MongoDB 6.0.20 at Snap Candidate. Thanks to MongoDB developers.

and fixes the following bugs:

  • Fixed env variable METRICS_ACCEPTED_IP_ADDRESS to be same as at docs. Thanks to salleman33.
  • Fixed misspelling of hours at env variable setting LDAP_BACKGROUND_SYNC_INTERVAL. Thanks to hubermam.
  • Helm Chart: Restore pod security context in deployment. Thanks to adalinesimonian.

Thanks to above GitHub users for their contributions and translators for their translations.
